item.title: Stop Using Maven Deploy
item.description: mvn deploy is the final phase of Maven’s build lifecycle. Itâ€™s responsible for uploading the artifacts produced by the previous phases of the build to an artifact repository like Nexus where they can be stored and accessed by other dependent projects, or used as part of an automated deployment.
